trans-unit.source: A trigger action that pauses a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
Use a PauseStoryboard with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to pause a Storyboard.
PauseStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).

To control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the PauseStoryboard must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Aby kontrolować <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>PauseStoryboard musi odwoływać się <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>programu, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>który określa, że <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: Zobacz [porady: Użyj wyzwalacze zdarzeń do kontrolowania scenorysu po jego uruchomieniu](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) przykład.

trans-unit.source: Beginning a Paused Animation When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered after it has been paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: Od momentu wstrzymana animacji <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>akcji jest wyzwalane po została wstrzymana, wygląda na to, aby wznowić i ponownie uruchomić.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: That's not what actually happens, however: the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action actually replaces itself with an unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: To nie faktycznie wpływ, jednak: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>akcji faktycznie zastępuje się przy użyciu wersji ze stanu wstrzymania.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Each time a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered, clock objects are created for its storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Zawsze <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>akcji zostanie wywołany, zegara obiekty są tworzone dla jego scenorysu.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: Zegary są dystrybuowane do ich animowania właściwości.

trans-unit.source: So, when a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is triggered again, it doesn't restart its clocks, it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: Tak, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>jest wyzwalane ponownie, nie go ponownie uruchomić jego zegary, zastępuje je z nowej zegary.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard"></xref> class.
